data.message: Shady def gunna b watching American ripper!! Proving Dr.h h Holmes was jack the ripper!!, I'm Involved with the project. Was the east coast field assistant for the book that came out a few years ago. This is on the history channel Tuesday at 10pm. I just ask cuz u love serial killers and u started a song with a snippet talking pits of lye vats of acid an incinerator.... That was his shit. Leo DiCaprio has the devil in the white city coming out about this guy too. Just figured I'd ask an tell if u wasn't aware
